text: Workshop on Annotation and Exploitation of Parallel Corpora ( AEPC ) .In recent years parallel corpora have become ever more useful for data - driven Machine Translation , Word Sense Disambiguation , or Cross - language Information Retrieval .Most of the time parallel corpora were used as raw texts ( i.e. without any linguistic annotation ) or with independent linguistic annotation ( i.e. linguistic annotation that was applied to either language side without resort to the other ) .
